title: Aurelion Sol not getting much love

replies.body:
i feel it's because if you want to put him midlane you need to ban like 8 enemy midlane options and 10 jungle ones. Zed, Talon, Ekko, Yasou, Akali, Fizz, Xerath, Velkoz, Ziggs, shaco, khazix, rengar, hecarim, volibear, xinzhao, warwick, vi, evelynn, master yi, ect... He's strong and he roams extremely well and his teamfight is good, but he loses bad to alot of poke mages and melee assassins which is kinda almost everything in the meta right now. Might as well just pick anivia for the teamfight and damage. I know aurelion sol roams extremely well but the issue is that he has alot of bad matchups that are currently meta and he's awkward to use for alot of people. He's also very vunerable to anyone that can get inside his star circle and the meta still favours melee ad assassins with strong early game due to the changes to tower first bloods even though we were moving into a tank jungle and poke midlane meta.
Overall the issue is mostly that despite the fact that he's strong, too many bad matchups are very meta right now and he's very weak pre-6 due to the type of junglers we have at the moment since if he tries to play aggressive, the jungler can just get alot of early gold out of him.

and lets keep it low!!

He is my fave champ, and i don't want him to become the next Yasuo and have every man and his dog play him...

He's quite good in ARAM.
Not too hard to get top _damage dealt to champs_ with him.
